articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance
						
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed an art performance given by the Song and Dance Ensemble of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces at the renovated Ponghwa Art Theatre.
					 Its colorful performance included "Glory to the Respected Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il", "Old Home Covered with Snow", "We Will Hold Our General in High Esteem", and "Footstep."
					
					 The artistes powerfully demonstrated the might of the internal security forces which have reliably protected the gains of the socialist homeland and people's security, glorifying the more than six decade-long tradition of devotedly defending the leader.
					
					 They, at the same time, successfully represented the firm faith and will of the servicepersons of the internal security forces to defend the Korean-style socialist system centered on the popular masses as firm as a rock.
					
					 Kim Jong Il expressed great satisfaction over the splendid performance given by them and extended high appreciation and thanks to them. 
					
					 After seeing the data on the history of the ensemble, he said that it has given full play to the might of the revolutionary soldiers art unit by successfully preserving the characteristics peculiar to it over the past more than six decades since the founding of its predecessor the Band of the Bureau of the Interior right after the liberation of Korea. Noting that it has produced many revolutionary and talented creators and artistes in this period, he highly appreciated its feats.
					
					 He set forth important tasks to serve as guidelines for art creation.
					
					 Accompanying him were Kim Jong Un, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Ki Nam, Kim Kyong Hui, Kang Sok Ju, Ju Sang Song, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, Kim Yang Gon, Pak To Chun, Thae Jong Su, Mun Kyong Dok, Ju Kyu Chang, Kim Chang Sop, senior officials of the party, state and armed forces organs, servicepersons of the KPA and the KPISF and officials in the field of culture and art.

articles.title: Songun Meeting of Youth for General Mobilization Held
articles.content:
Songun Meeting of Youth for General Mobilization Held
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The Songun Meeting of Youth for General Mobilization took place here on Saturday. 
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Ryong Hae and officials concerned, those of merits, exemplary youth league officials, and students.
					
					The meeting discussed the tasks and ways for all young people to give full play to the heroic spirit and might of the young vanguard of Songun in the general offensive for materializing the desire of President Kim Il Sung to build a rich and powerful country true to the grandiose plan of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, conveyed a congratulatory message sent by the C. C., WPK to the participants of the meeting. 
					
					 The message said the young people have honorably defended the dignity of Songun Korea and Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses at the outpost of the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggle and bolstered the defence capability of the country, turning it into an invulnerable fortress. They have rendered services for providing a firm guarantee for the building of a thriving nation with matchless armed forces, it added. 
					
					 The young people have performed great labor feats in achieving the great success of the self-supporting economy and laying a foundation for making a leap forward in the efforts to realize the ideal to build a thriving nation as vanguard and shock brigade in the building of an economic power, the message noted, and went on:
					
					 The WPK is highly proud of having a large contingent of viable young people who play major roles in the national defence and socialist construction. 
					
					 Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the Central Committee of the youth league, in his report underscored the need for the young people who are most active in society to bring about great innovations and a big leap forward in the van of the general offensive and fully display once again the high spirit and mettle as the youth of Songun Korea in the dynamic struggle to put up the plate of a thriving nation on the gate of the country. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting. 
					
					 A congratulatory group of the Korean Children's Union of the meeting recited a congratulatory poem at the meeting. 
					
					 An appeal to the youth across the country was adopted there. 
					
					 The appeal noted that success in the efforts to open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012 hinges on the young people. It called upon all the young people to become young heroes dashing ahead of others to build a thriving nation.

articles.title: Young Koreans Prove Successful in Mass Movement
articles.content:
Young Koreans Prove Successful in Mass Movement
						
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The young Koreans are bringing about innovations in the efforts to improve the standard of people's living through a brisk mass movement.
					 Many young people of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex formed a youth shock brigade in the first 15 days of January, greatly contributing to keeping the iron and steel production going at a high rate.
					
					 Young workers of the Pukchang Thermal Power Complex also formed a shock brigade and conducted more than ten campaigns, contributing to increasing the electricity production.
					
					 The members of the Kim Hyok Youth Shock Brigade at the Unryul Mine produced hundreds of tons of iron ore in a matter of 10 odd days.
					
					 Nearly 100 young people of the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill carried out their January's national economy plan ahead of schedule.
					
					 Signal successes made in boosting production through the mass movement of young people were reported from the February 8 Vinalon Complex, the Chollima Steel Complex, the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, the Pyongyang Textile Mill and other industrial establishments in the field of light industry, pilot and key domains of the national economy.
					
					At least 353,900 young people in more than 170 cities and counties including Chongjin City of North Hamgyong Province, Hamhung City of South Hamgyong Province and Kujang County of North Phyongan Province conducted shock brigade activities and a do-good-thing campaign for the last one month, sending lots of compost and varieties of small farm implements to cooperative farms and their young sub-workteams and young workteams.
					
					 At the construction site of Hungju Youth Power Station No. 3 young people took upon themselves difficult and toilsome work including rock tunneling and ground leveling and overfulfilled their construction plan.
					
					 Shock brigade activities are making dynamic progress to wind up the construction projects ahead of schedule in North Hwanghae and North Hamgyong provinces.

articles.title: Sports School Famous for Training Promising Footballers
articles.content:
Sports School Famous for Training Promising Footballers 
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The Pothonggang District Sports School for School Youth and Children in Pyongyang was well known with 2010 U-16 Asia Cup as an occasion. 
					 Five players of the DPRK national team which won the cup graduated from this school.
					
					 Forward Jo Kwang scored four goals at the cup by displaying his feat. He scored three goals in the semi-finals with the Jordanian rival and one goal in the finals with the Uzbek rival, enabling his team to win the cup.
					
					 Half back Pak Myong Song, goal keeper An Kang Chol and all other graduates from the school did their best in the matches, making great contributions to the team's winning of the title.
					
					 The school produced many promising boys and girls footballers in the past.
					
					 Nam Song Guk, Kim Song Hui and Choe Yong Sim of the Pyongyang Sports Team and Jo Jong Chol of the Rimyongsu Sports Team cut conspicuous figures at international tournaments.
					
					 Kim Song Hui greatly contributed to the DPRK team's winning of the title at the 3rd World Youth Women's Soccer Championship. She received silver football spikes there.
					
					 The school won national tournaments several times including national sports tournaments among sports schools of school youth and children.
					
					 Hundreds of graduates from this school are active at premier football teams in the country.

articles.title: Diverse Aspects of Korean People's Life
articles.content:
Diverse Aspects of Korean People's Life
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- National flavor is strongly felt in the Korean people's life and noble and beautiful traits are in full bloom in the era of Songun. 
					 Colorful art performances are staged and folk games and national sports games are played on such folk holidays as the lunar New Year's Day, the January 15th of the lunar calendar and Chusok (harvest full moon day). 
					
					 Peculiar competitive national dish shows and Korean fashion shows are held to draw large crowds of visitors. 
					
					 Korean folk songs and merry laughter are heard from scenic spots, pleasure grounds and parks across the country on holidays and off-days. 
					
					 The revolutionary soldier culture, the Songun culture is efflorescing among the Korean people under the impact of art festivals of soldiers and singing contests of working people. 
					
					 Songs from the five revolutionary operas, lyric poems "Pardon Me", "Mother", "My Country" and other literary works created in the DPRK grip the hearts of all the soldiers and people, encouraging them to perform fresh feats. 
					
					 Fairyland of socialism appears in various parts of the country. Happy laughter is heard from the streets, villages, families and worksites.

articles.title: Historic Meeting that Brought Fresh Surge in Korean Revolution
articles.content:
Historic Meeting that Brought Fresh Surge in Korean Revolution
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung convened a meeting of military and political cadres of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army in Nanhutou, Ningan County on Feb. 27, 1936.
					 At that time the hatred of the Korean people against the Japanese imperialists reached its height as they desperately worked to suppress the anti-Japanese movement in Korea.
					
					 Under the guidance of Kim Il Sung many revolutionaries grew up amid the arduous struggle for years and the KPRA developed into the powerful armed forces which were tempered politically and ideologically and which acquired a wealth of combat experience.
					
					 On the basis of a scientific insight into the situation which prevailed at that time and the requirements of the developing revolution he delivered a report titled "The Tasks of Communists in the Strengthening and Development of the Anti-Japanese National Liberation Struggle" at the meeting.
					
					 He, in the report, called on the Korean communists to work heart and soul for the Korean revolution, deeply aware of the truth that they are the masters of it and their responsibility.
					
					 He also clarified the tasks for letting the main force of the KPRA advance into the border areas, gradually expanding the theatre of its actions to the homeland, further developing the movement for the anti-Japanese national united front and positively pushing ahead with preparations for founding a party.
					
					 The strategic and tactical policies set forth by the President were as independent ones as they indicated the road of the anti-Japanese national liberation struggle centering on the armed struggle as required by the developing revolution and the ways for carrying out the cause of national liberation by the efforts of the Koreans.
					
					 The historic Nanhutou meeting gave a momentum to the Korean revolution's ever-victorious advance under the banner of Juche.

articles.title: KCNA on NIS Agents' Intrusion into Hotel Room for Indonesian VIP
articles.content:
KCNA on NIS Agents' Intrusion into Hotel Room for Indonesian VIP 
						
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- An evil deed will be discovered. The same can be said of what the south Korean Intelligence Service did. 
					 As already reported, on February 16, its three agents intruded into a hotel room of the party of the Indonesian presidential envoy to get a notebook computer only to be spotted by its owner and return it to him.
					
					 Soon after the occurrence of the case the Indonesian government urged the south Korean authorities to immediately clarify the truth about the case.
					
					 At first the NIS said it had nothing to do with the case, but it admitted the responsibility for it, much upset by the development of the case into an international issue. The director of the NIS expressed his will to resign, noting that he would own the blame for it. 
					
					 This case affected the arms deal with Indonesia and the anti-government and anti-Lee Myung Bak sentiment is mounting among different circles of south Korea, becoming a headache of the puppet group. 
					
					 Opposition parties and public opinion are demanding Lee come out to make an apology by himself. 
					
					 The NIS has earned an ill-fame for having hatched all sorts of plots and committed a lot of evil deeds to incite confrontation with fellow countrymen and maintain the dictatorial regime for several decades since the time of its predecessors the "Central Intelligence Agency" and the "Security Planning Board".
					
					 There were not a few cases for which NIS suffered disgrace in the international arena. Agents of the NIS were arrested and expelled from Libya last year.
					
					 The south Korean people are, therefore, ridiculing the NIS as an agency causing only anxiety.
					
					 It is worth noting that the NIS can do whatever it likes, except changing a man into a woman and vice versa.

articles.title: Korean Revolution Associated with Love for People--Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Korean Revolution Associated with Love for People--Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The love for the people is the basic idea running through in the long history of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean revolution, says Rodong Sinmun in a bylined article Saturday.
					 The article further says:
					
					 The Korean revolution has always emerged victorious without the slightest deviation in untrodden path for hewing out the destiny of the popular masses. Its secrete lies in the love for the people. This love serves as a sure guarantee for building a thriving socialist nation for eternal prosperity of the nation in the near future.
					
					 The greatest love for the people is to arm the popular masses with consciousness of independence and give them the highest dignity and personality, and the Korean revolution is run through with this love.
					
					 The Korean revolution is for ensuring the dignity and rights of the popular masses at the highest level.
					
					 The present high dignity and rights of the Korean people would have been unthinkable without the socialist homeland of Juche. The DPRK represents the dignity and right of its popular masses.
					
					 The Korean revolution provides the people with affluent and highly civilized life by remarkably improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 Everyone in the DPRK has been provided all living conditions needed for food, clothing and housing by the state and society thanks to the WPK's love and dedicated service for the people and the state's public policies.
					
					 Our country will soon come to brilliant reality in which its people enjoy all kinds of happiness because there are the mother party taking care of the destiny and future of the people to the last and the people's power playing the role of the master for their livelihood.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Kim Jong Il's Feats for Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Kim Jong Il's Feats for Korea's Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- "By our nation itself" has become the idea of the times, and all Koreans are pooling their mind and efforts for independent reunification of the country. This stirring reality is great fruition of the distinguished leadership and patriotic devotion of Kim Jong Il, the sun of the nation and lodestar of national reunification.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 The article praises Kim Jong Il as the peerlessly great man who, with the will to build a reunified, strong and prosperous country in Korea true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung, is wisely leading the struggle to this end.
					
					 It further says:
					
					 He is the great sun of the Korean nation clearly indicating the way for national independence and reunification with his unique ideo-theoretical wisdom. He is also the lodestar of the nation as he steers the cause of national reunification to shining victory with his rare and seasoned leadership.
					
					 He formulated the reunification programmes associated with the lofty intention of the President as the three charters for national reunification. This was a vivid expression of his iron faith and will to carry out the cause of national reunification on the basis of the line and policies set forth by the President no matter how the situation and circumstances may change.
					
					 He also advanced the five-point policy for great national unity. This is distinguished feat as it laid an ideo-theoretical basis for developing on a new higher stage the Koreans' struggle to implement the President's idea and line of great national unity.
					
					 Peace has been kept on the Korean Peninsula and the Koreans' desire for reunification is growing stronger despite the vicious moves for confrontation and war on the part of the separatist forces. This would have been unthinkable without the prominent leadership of Kim Jong Il over national reunification.
					
					 All the Koreans absolutely trust and follow him opening up an epochal turn in national reunification with his great idea and distinguished leadership.

articles.title: S. Korean Ministry of Unification Accused of Its Confrontation Policy
articles.content:
S. Korean Ministry of Unification Accused of Its Confrontation Policy
						
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- A floor spokesman for the Democratic Party of south Korea denounced the Ministry of Unification for its policy of confrontation on Feb. 23.
					 He chided the ministry for claiming recently that "its policy towards the north over the last three years was a principled one."
					
					 He ridiculed the ministry, saying people are raising such question as to whether it has existed under the present "government", yet it is so absurd as to praise itself.
					
					 Holding that the south-north relations have deteriorated due to the present "government," he stressed that the ministry should feel ashamed of it.
					
					 There is no need to maintain the ministry indifferent to reunification any longer but there should be only a ministry for reunification active for inter-Korean dialogue, exchange and cooperation, he held.

articles.title: S. Korean Opposition Party Calls for Improved Ties with North
articles.content:
S. Korean Opposition Party Calls for Improved Ties with North
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Pak Ji Won, the floor leader of the Democratic Party of south Korea, told the "National Assembly" on Tuesday that the relations between the south and north of Korea should be recovered through dialogue, exchange and cooperation, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Thongil News.
					 Dialogue should not be suspended in any case, Pak said, urging the "government" to set out to improve relations with the north as early possible. 
					
					 "The improvement is also needed for our economy," he added.

articles.title: Sports Tournament of Koreans Held in Japan
articles.content:
Sports Tournament of Koreans Held in Japan
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- A relay race and marathon tournament of Koreans in Osaka, Japan, took place at the stadium in the city of Osaka on Feb. 6 to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Attending it were Pu Yong Uk, chairman of the Osaka Prefectural Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, Kim Hyon I, chairperson of the Osaka Prefectural Sports Association, Ri U Jin, chairman of the Osaka Prefectural Athletic Events Association, youth and students and other Korean residents in Japan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Observed at DPRK Missions Overseas
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Observed at DPRK Missions Overseas
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Events took place at DPRK embassies in foreign countries from Feb. 5 to 15 to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 They included receptions, meetings, book and photo exhibitions and film shows at those missions in Cuba, Syria, Indonesia, Pakistan, Malaysia, Cambodia, Myanmar, Bangladesh, Nepal, Uzbekistan, Italy, Switzerland, Poland, Sweden, the Czech Republic, Romania, Uganda, Equatorial Guinea, Mexico and Brazil.
					
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, photos on their immortal exploits and books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched Koreans films.
					
					 Present there on invitation were personages of different strata, heads of Juche idea study organizations and friendship and solidarity organizations with the Korean people and foreign diplomatic envoys in those countries.
					
					 Officials of the DPRK missions were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Wise Leadership Praised by Brazilian Political Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Wise Leadership Praised by Brazilian Political Figure 
						
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il has steered to victory the Korean people's struggle to foil the imperialists' aggression and challenge and protect the sovereignty of the country and the nation, regarding President Kim Il Sung's revolutionary idea as the only guidelines.
					 Pedro De Oliveira, assistant to the national chairman of the C.C., the Brazilian Communist Party, said this in a statement on Feb. 14 on the occasion of Kim Jong Il's birthday.
					
					 The Korean people's desire for building a prosperous country true to the last instructions of the President is being translated into a brilliant reality thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, the statement noted.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Spanish Political Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Spanish Political Figure
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- It is one of the greatest feats of General Secretary Kim Jong Il that he turned socialist Korea into a politico-ideological and military power.
					 The secretary for International Relations of the Communist Party of the People of Spain said this in a statement issued on Feb. 15 on the occasion of his birthday.
					
					 The statement noted: 
					
					 Kim Jong Il's loving care for the people reached every nook and corner of the DPRK.  
					
					 He authored many famous works such as "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable" and "Socialism Is a Science" in which he scientifically clarified the validity of the socialist cause and its sure victory.
					
					 The cause of socialism is sure to triumph as clarified by him.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Brazilian Party and Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Brazilian Party and Nigerian Organization
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Communist Party and the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on their Internet homepages articles on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The BCP on Feb. 12 posted on its Internet homepage an article titled "Cause of Independence and Kim Jong Il" which said: Kim Jong Il provided a sure guarantee for the victory of the cause of independence and a treasured sword for winning a sure victory.
					
					 He established the Songun political mode on the basis of his insight into the importance of an army and arms in accomplishing the cause of independence and the stern reality of the anti-imperialist struggle.
					
					 He put forward the Korean People's Army as a pillar and a main force of the revolution and has channeled primary efforts into bolstering the army.
					
					 We warmly congratulate Kim Jong Il, defender of the cause of independence.
					
					 The Nigerian committee on Feb. 6 posted on its Internet homepage an article introducing the fact that Kim Jong Il, regarding his love for the people as his inborn disposition, has devoted his all to their happiness.

articles.title: Seminars Held Abroad to Mark Kim Jong Il's Birthday
articles.content:
Seminars Held Abroad to Mark Kim Jong Il's Birthday
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held in Uganda, Tanzania, Germany, Peru and Nigeria between Feb. 10 and 15 to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Baguma Isoke, director general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and chairman of the Ugandan National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, and other speakers highly praised Kim Jong Il as an outstanding thinker and theoretician who has developed in depth the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 Francis F. Lyimo, chairman of the Tanzanian National Coordinating Committee of the Juche Idea Study Groups, expressed belief that the Korean people would make greater successes in their struggle for building a thriving nation and reunifying the country under the experienced and seasoned leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated the Songun politics as a main political mode under socialism and put forward the army as a pillar and a driving force for not only defending the country but building socialism, thereby firmly protecting the sovereignty of the DPRK from the imperialists' moves to stifle it, noted the chief of the Hannover Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Germany.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the seminars in Germany and Peru.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated Abroad
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries between Feb. 10 and 15 to mark the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 They included meetings, film shows and photo exhibitions in Nepal, Iran, Myanmar, Malaysia, South Africa and Ethiopia.
					
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were photos on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and other photos showing the Korean people's drive to build a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched "Pyongyang Today", "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" and "Reply of Korea" and other Korean films.
					
					 The director of the International Department of the Central Committee of the Nepal Worker-Peasant Party and other speakers said that the future of the Korean people is as rosy as the blue sky as they are led by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They extended support and solidarity to the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in their struggle to implement the tasks advanced in the joint New Year editorial.
					
					 The president of the International Taekwon-Do Association in Iran noted that the birth of Kim Jong Il was a fortune for the world progressives.
					
					 Kim Jong Il put forward the popular masses as a driving force of history and has performed miracles baffling human imagination by relying on their might, said the chairman of the Group for the Study of the Progressive Ideas of South Africa.

articles.title: Japan, US to Stage Missile-intercepting Training
articles.content:
Japan, US to Stage Missile-intercepting Training 
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Japan and the U.S. reportedly plan to stage a mock training for detecting, tracking and intercepting ballistic missiles in the Yokosuka base in Japan from February 28 to March 3.
					 The Staff of the Japanese Maritime Self-Defense Force (MSDF) announced Tuesday that the drill will be participated in by seven vessels, including the aegis warship Zyokai from MSDF and the John S. McCain from the U.S.
					
					 Such drill involving aegis vessels of Japan and the U.S. took place in last December as part of joint combined exercises but it is the first time for the MSDF and the U.S. navy to conduct a separate training, said the Japanese Jiji Press.

articles.title: Fukuda Opposes Dietmen's Visit to Yasukuni Shrine
articles.content:
Fukuda Opposes Dietmen's Visit to Yasukuni Shrine
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Former Japanese Prime Minister Yasuo Fukuda in a lecture Monday raised an objection to dietmen's collective visit to the Yasukuni Shrine, said the Japanese Jiji Press.
					 He is of the view that such visit should not be made openly in a group, the news agency added.

articles.title: Conferencia de Movilizacion General de la Juventud del Songun
articles.content:
Conferencia de Movilizacion General de la Juventud del Songun
Pyongyang, 26 de febrero (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 26 en esta capital la Conferencia de Movilizacion General de la Juventud del Songun.
					  Al acto asistieron Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Ryong Hae y otros funcionarios, los benemeritos, los ejemplares funcionarios de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, jovenes y estudiantes.
					
					  En el conclave fueron debatidos las tareas de todos los jovenes para poner de pleno manifiesto el impetu heroico y el poderio de la vanguardia juvenil del Songun en la ofensiva general y la lucha encaminadas a materializar el deseo del Presidente Kim Il Sung de construir la patria rica y poderosa en pleno acato al gran proyecto del Dirigente          Kim Jong Il y los remedios para cumplirlas.
					
					  Ante todo, Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio lectura al mensaje de felicitacion del CC del PTC a los participantes en la conferencia.
					
					  La misiva subraya que los jovenes defendieron honrosamente la dignidad de la Corea del Songun y el socialismo al estilo coreano centrado en las masas populares en la linea avanzada del frente de la confrontacion con los imperialistas y los yanquis, consolidaron el poderio defensivo del pais como fortaleza inexpugnable y contribuyeron a garantizar con firmeza la construccion de la gran potencia prospera con las fuerzas militares invencibles.
					
					  Prosigue que los jovenes realizaron grandes meritos laborales en preparar la base de saltos para lograr gran victoria de la economia independiente y realizar por completo el ideal de la gran potencia prospera siendo la vanguardia y la brigada en la edificacion de la potencia economica.
					
					  Apunta que es gran orgullo del PTC contar con el gran destacamento de jovenes con vigor que se encargan del papel protagonico en la defensa de la patria y la construccion socialista.
					
					  El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Ri Yong Chol, primer secretario del CC de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, quien destaco que los jovenes, destacamento de combate mas energico de la sociedad, deben volver a demostrar el impetu valiente y el coraje de la juventud de la Corea del Songun en la lucha solemne por registrar grandes innovaciones y saltos al frente de la ofensiva general y poner la placa en las puertas de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					  En la conferencia hubo intervenciones.
					
					  Fue recitada la poesia de felicitacion por el grupo de congratulacion de la Union de Ninos de Corea para esta conferencia y aprobado el llamamiento a los jovenes de todo el pais.
					
					  El llamamiento senala que el exito de la lucha por abrir las puertas a la gran potencia prospera en 2012 depende del papel de los jovenes y exhorta a estos a ser heroes jovenes que corren al frente de la pista recta para edificar la gran potencia prospera.

articles.title: ATCC comenta incomoda situacion de "Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia"
articles.content:
ATCC comenta incomoda situacion de "Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia"
Pyongyang, 26 de febrero (ATCC) -- Segun trascendidos, 3 agentes del "Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia" del Sur de Corea se infiltraron el dia 16 en la residencia de la delegacion del enviado especial del presidente indonesio que visito al Sur de Corea.
					  Al ser sorprendidos por un miembro de la delegacion, ellos tuvieron que devolverle la computadora robada.
					
					  El gobierno indonesio reacciono inmediatamente demandando a las autoridades surcoreanas confirmar lo sucedido.
					
					  El "Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia" se hizo el sueco al principio, pero reconocio su responsabilidad por el temor a que el caso flotara como escandalo internacional.
					
					  El presidente de ese organo dijo que se responsabilizara del caso exponiendo la voluntad de dimitir.
					
					  Debido al incidente, se vera afectado el negocio de armas con Indonesia y se acrecento en distintos sectores del Sur de Corea el clima antigubernamental y anti-Lee Myung Bak.
					
					  Los partidos opositores y la opinion publica demandan a Lee Myung Bak pedir disculpas a su nombre.
					
					  Durante varios decenios desde que era "Agencia Central de Inteligencia" y "Departamento de Planificacion para la Seguridad", ese aparato urdio los complots y cometio todas las fechorias para mantener la confrontacion fratricida y el "poder" dictatorial.
					
					  En el ano pasado, ha pasado tremenda pena en la arena internacional al estallar el caso de sus agentes deportados de Libia.
					
					  Esos hechos bochornosos ponen en entredicho la afirmacion de que el "Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia" es capaz de cualquier cosa, excepto a la operacion transexual.

articles.title: Actos por el 16 de febrero en representaciones coreanas
articles.content:
Actos por el 16 de febrero en representaciones coreanas
Pyongyang, 26 de febrero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del cumpleanos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, tuvieron lugar del dia 5 al 15 recepciones, mitines, exposiciones de libros y fotos y proyecciones filmicas en las embajadas coreanas en Cuba, Siria, Indonesia, Pakistan, Malasia, Camboya, Myanmar, Bangladesh, Nepal, Uzbekistan, Italia, Suiza, Polonia, Suecia, Checo, Rumania, Uganda, Guinea Ecuatorial, Mexico y Brasil.
					En las ocasiones estaban expuestos las obras del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, las fotos alusivas a sus imborrables proezas, libros y fotos que dan a conocer a la Corea del Songun.
					
					En los encuentros de cine se llevaron a la pantalla varios documentales coreanos.
					
					Fueron invitados las personalidades de diversos estratos, los titulares de las organizaciones de estudio de la idea Juche y las entidades de amistad y solidaridad con el pueblo coreano y los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises en los respectivos paises.
					
					Estuvieron presentes tambien los funcionarios de las representaciones coreanas.
					
					Varias personalidades hicieron uso de la palabra.

articles.title: Escuela deportiva de jovenes y ninos del municipio de Pothong
articles.content:
Escuela deportiva de jovenes y ninos del municipio de Pothong
Pyongyang, 26 de febrero (ATCC) -- La Escuela Deportiva de Jovenes y Ninos del capitalino municipio de Pothong se hizo famosa en todo el pais por sus 5 graduados que formaron parte de la seleccion coreana vencedora del Campeonato Asiatico de Futbol sub-16 2010.
					  Especialmente, el delantero Jo Kwang marco 4 goles en total en esa cita deportiva, a saber, 3 en la semifinal frente a Jordania y el decisivo gol en la final contra Uzbekistan.
					
					  Contribuyeron tambien a la victoria el mediocampista Pak Myong Song, el portero An Kang Chol y otros dos graduados.
					
					  Anteriormente, aprendieron a jugar el futbol en esa escuela los jugadores estelares Nam Song Guk, Kim Song Hui y Choe Yong Sim del Conjunto Deportivo de Pyongyang y Jo Jong Chol del Conjunto Deportivo Rimyongsu.
					
					  Kim Song Hui recibio la bota de plata por su gran aporte al triunfo de la seleccion coreana en el III Campeonato Mundial de Futbol Sub-20 (F).
					
					  La escuela alcanzo varias veces exitos alentadores en los eventos nacionales como torneo nacional de escuelas deportivas.
					
					  Cientos de graduados actuan ahora en los equipos de futbol de la clase A de Corea.
